review: I had a terrible experience with Clove Dental earlier, but I was relieved to find that The Dental Office: Harlur Road made my recent root canal treatment very comfortable. Dr. Ashina was very reassuring and attentive to my concerns, always making sure that she made me feel comfortable throughout the procedure. Her assistant, Dr. Shweta, is also great at what she does‚ÄîI could tell right away that she knew her job well and could handle any situation that arose during my treatment. Overall, I'd definitely recommend this practice to anyone looking for dental work because they make you feel at ease from the moment you walk in the door!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: This is the second time I consulted Dr. Shweta in The Dental Office clinic, Haralur Road. First time for my wisdom tooth extraction and this time for severe pain in one molar. Dr. Shweta diagnosed and explained all the issues very well. My tooth pain was gone in a day and further RCT was performed along with filling and cap fitting. The whole process of the treatment was nothing but pleasant across all aspects - timely appointment, minimal waiting time, clear explanation of issues, friendliness. I would definitely recommend this clinic for any dental issues.
reply_text: Thanks for your valuable feedback from whole team!

context: Endo Surgery Or Apicoectomy,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,
review: I consulted with Dr. Shweta for pain in my upper front tooth and during investigation Doctor found out that in addition to decay there is a lesion as well. Doctor explained it clearly about how to proceed with such cases. Both pros and cons were clearly articulated. Dr. Irfan did the Apicoectomy proceedure which was completely painless and was able to recover within a week. Root canal for front tooth and few other stuff as part of normal checkup was satisfactory completed. Thanks to Doctor Shweta and Dr. Mehnaz, I don‚Äôt have any more problems with with my tooth.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The doctors at The Dental Office, Haralur - Dr. Irfan, Dr. Kartik, Dr. Shweta and Dr. Mehnaz have been very professional and accomodative throughout my tooth extraction + RCT process. 
At every stage, the doctors clearly explained the issue as well as the steps involved in the treatment. They ensured appropriate scheduling of sessions despite my time constraints, regularly called to follow-up and were always available to assist with queries over phone. The cost of treatment was reasonable too.
Overall, it has been a friendly / pleasant experience, I would recommend The Dental Office, Haralur for treating any tooth ailments.

review:
Recently my daughter's upper tooth was loose from past 1 month, due to this covid situation i couldn't go to hospital,.then my friend recommended Dentist Shweta's Clinic. She took all safety precautions. My daughter was scarred seeing the equipment but i must say Shweta pampered her, made her feel comfortable, diverted her mind and took her teeth within a sec. My daughter didn't even feel it.
I was so happy with her work.

3days before my husband had pain in wisdom tooth. He visited her clinic as per my past experience with Shweta. No doubt in her treatment, he is feeling much better now.
She took all safety precautions, must recommended her clinic. Thank you so much Dentist Shweta Kumari for help in this covid situation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My dad was having a toothache and like most of us would typically do, I googled 'Dentists near me' :). Of the various options that i got, this had the best reviews. Although, I would generally not go by only this and do some additional research, i had to take this chance as my dad was in great pain and i wanted an immediate fix. While I was skeptical on how things would go ahead with our visit, i was pleasantly surprised with how things were taken care of. The doctor diagnosed the problem and prescribed some meds for pain and recommended a tooth extraction. This was done by Dr. Irfan who was again very professional in his approach and calmed my dad's nerves, who was anxious as this was his first tooth extraction ever. Later he explained in detail the do's and don'ts. The overall experience was simply good and now i know for sure the place i need to visit for any dental issues. Thank you!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I visited the clinic for tooth ache. On diagnosing Dr sugandha trivedi explained me the issue and suggested for RCT. She did a commendable job in doing the RCT. Gave appointment based on my time and never hurry up the treatment. She made sure i am completely satisfied with the entire procedure. Helpers was well behaved but have to make sure not to discomfort the patient with the suction required during the process. That was only the irritating part during my experience.

Keep up the good work Dr, sugandha trivedi. Strongly recommend her.
reply_text: Thanks for your valuable feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had been to the clinic as my old filling was completely gone and my tooth started paining badly. Once Dr Shweta examined my teeth she explained just a filling would not get rid of the pain. So she suggested Root Canal Treatment. I have had friends who shared bad experiences with RCT, but Dr Shweta carried out the treatment so well, it was way better than I thought. She is very genuine and reasonable.

P.S: Dosent mean you don't take care of your oral hygiene, get your tooth checked once in a year atleast :P

tags: Value for money,
review:
I was shown consultation charges of ‚Çπ300 but dentist charged me ‚Çπ500 and ‚Çπ200 for x-ray of tooth ?
These charges are high since no procedures were done. I was told to visit again, when there's pain without taking medicines.
I'd never visit this clinic, in future.
reply_text:
Hi
You saw charges 300 on practo.com because the new charges were yet to be updated ( it was delayed due to some technical problem). Also, yes the price has been revised due to current COVID situation.
Normal consultation and xray charges are always there in a dental clinic.
Also the patient has  been sent because on tele- consultation on phone he told pain is there but when he came to clinic and on clinical examination there was no pain.In this situation we dnt remove tooth and wait and watch.
Sorry for the inconvenience caused.
We are ready to hear from you still if you have any doubts.
Thanx

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: My daughter's teeth were misaligned and her jaw was projected when she got her permanent teeth and it was affecting her confidence. Many orthodontists declined her case and even suggested a jaw surgery when she reaches 18 years. At that point when we were helpless, my dentist friend suggested us to visit Dr. Byju Mathew. Dr.Byju has done an exceptionally good work on her teeth without the need of surgical procedure. From the first visit in the Dental office he has explained each process very well and was giving clear instructions.  Dr. Shweta also was very cordial and friendly.  My daughter has regained her confidence and her jaws also got aligned perfectly along with her teeth. We are extremely grateful to Dr.Byju and Dental Office for the excellent work which has brought the beautiful smile and confidence back on her face. We recommend Dr.Byju and Dental Office for anyone facing the same issues.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Fillings,Post and Core,Dental X-Ray,Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review:
I had availed an intensive service with Dr. Shweta for the last 5 months at a stretch. As I have plans to relocate from the country, there were multiple serious issues concerning my tooth , hence the extensive and prolonged services provided by Dr. Shweta and her expert team is truly commendable. The detailed vigilance, the acute precision, taking X-rays and validating the procedure accuracy, being too caring in regards to pain & sensitivity both towards my fears & tooth situation, everything was really done to perfection. Post treatment care was also performed with due diligence. Time was one of the crucial factor that should be highlighted. She is very punctual and the clinic is very well equipped with all the latest technology. 
I would sincerely highly recommend to avail & attend Dr. Shweta‚Äôs clinic as her services is a benchmark in this professional world. Thank You Dr.

tags: Wait time,
review:
She was too talkative and tried her best to convince me to extract. I have a wisdom tooth issue and I wanted her to check for cavities too. But she said I have no cavities and barely checked my other teeth. She spent all her time talking about the extraction.  * **** * **** ******** ** **** ***** ******* ***** *** *** ******** **** ****
When you are scared and in pain you want to be dealt with accordingly not hear stories
reply_text:
Hi
In regard to your complaint, would like to explain few things..
1. As you have mentioned, you had wisdom tooth issues , and yes wisdom tooth is an extra tooth so the permanent solution for impaction of wisdom tooth is extraction( removal) only that we suggested as  we don't believe in any quick fix but permanent solution of problem.Your pain was primarily because of wisdom tooth so we were insisting on that, as we also don't want a prolonged treatment for a patient in this covid times ( many visits to clinic).
Again wisdom tooth problem involves defenitely an extraction as permanent solution as it is an extra tooth. 
2.we did not find any cavities and we adhere with our diagnosis as food can be stuck in many places, even between two teeth with gaps.When there is no cavities , only discoloration we just can't label it as cavities and do filling.That kind of unethical work we don't do.
Thanks
